title: (x) Compact sans with cut-off corners - ITC Machine {Jan E}
content:
Im trying to find a free version of this font as close as i can get it. So far i have found some similar fonts but none that hit the jackpot.  
This is for my final year college project so its important if anyone could help i would appreciate it.  
Here is the reference to the type:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203180913im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/1797687551_58040d64ac_o_6081.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203180913im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/1798529506_9e68e29e23_o_5658.jpg)

 [‹ (x) thin Art Deco display sans - Bernhard Fashion {Marten F}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203180913/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38731 "Go to previous forum topic") ["Show Bread" weathered sans serif on T-shirt ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203180913/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38738 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nephronim

comments.content: Isn’t that Machine? Wasn’t that once a mac system font?
It is Machine, both ITC and Bitstream have versions. $24 at Myfonts.
